long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interface:
✅ Cute bookmarks with rounded corners
✅ Quick access to Downloads, Bookmarks, History, Settings
✅ Beautiful site logos
✅ Backgrounds

Behavior:
✅ Ability to choose where to open the bookmark (this is a tab / new tab)
✅ Context actions for bookmarks
✅ Bookmark grid selection
✅ Ability to leave empty rows and cells in the grid
✅ Ability to import/load bookmark grid from file and cloud
✅ Cache icons if no internet
✅ Keyboard shortcuts

Back:
✅ Completely open source
✅ No tracking of the user
